trans-unit.source: There are three main approaches to the problem of NULLs. NULL index values can be treated as a single group (nulls_equal). This is usually fine, but if you have large numbers of NULLs the average group size is slanted higher, and the optimizer may miss using the index for ref accesses when it would be useful. This is the default used by XtraDB/InnoDB and MyISAM. Nulls_unequal is the opposite approach, with each NULL forming its own group of one. Conversely, the average group size is slanted lower, and the optimizer may use the index for ref accesses when not suitable. This is the default used by the Aria storage engine. A third options sees NULL's ignored altogether from index group calculations.
trans-unit.target: 对于NULLs的问题,主要有三种方法。NULL索引值可以被当作一个单一的组(nulls_equal)。这通常是很好的,但是如果你有大量的NULL,平均组的大小就会倾斜得更高,优化器可能会错过使用索引进行ref访问,而这是有用的。这是XtraDB/InnoDB和MyISAM使用的默认值。Nulls_unequal是相反的方法,每个NULL形成自己的一个组。反之,平均组的大小倾斜较低,优化器可能会在不合适的时候使用索引进行ref访问。这是Aria存储引擎使用的默认值。第三个选项认为在索引组计算中完全忽略NULL的。

trans-unit.source: There are two different kinds of table discovery — a fully automatic discovery and a user-assisted one. In the former, the engine can automatically discover the table whenever an SQL statement needs it. In MariaDB, the Archive and Sequence engines support this kind of discovery. For example, one can copy a t1.ARZ file into the database directory and immediately start using it — the corresponding .frm file will be created automatically. Or one can select from say, the seq_1_to_10 table without any explicit CREATE TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 有两种不同类型的表发现-全自动发现和用户辅助发现。在前者中，引擎可以在需要SQL语句时自动发现表。在MariaDB中，存档和序列引擎支持这种发现。例如，您可以将 t1.ARZ 文件复制到数据库目录中并立即开始使用它-相应的 .frm 文件将自动创建。或者可以从其中选择 seq_1_to_10 表，而无需任何显式的 CREATE TABLE 语句。

trans-unit.source: There are two encryption key identifiers that have special meanings in MariaDB. Encryption key 1 is intended for encrypting system data, such as InnoDB redo logs, binary logs, and so on. It must always exist when data-at-rest encryption is enabled. Encryption key 2 is intended for encrypting temporary data, such as temporary files and temporary tables. It is optional. If it doesn't exist, then MariaDB uses encryption key 1 for these purposes instead.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，有两个具有特殊含义的加密密钥标识符。加密密钥 1 用于加密系统数据，例如InnoDB重做日志，二进制日志等。启用静态数据加密后，它必须始终存在。加密密钥 2 用于加密临时数据，例如临时文件和临时表。它是可选的。如果不存在，则MariaDB会出于这些目的使用加密密钥 1 。

trans-unit.source: There can be only one AUTO_INCREMENT column per table, it must be indexed, and it cannot have a DEFAULT value. An AUTO_INCREMENT column works properly only if it contains only positive values. Inserting a negative number is regarded as inserting a very large positive number. This is done to avoid precision problems when numbers wrap over from positive to negative and also to ensure that you do not accidentally get an AUTO_INCREMENT column that contains 0.
trans-unit.target: 每个表只能有一个 AUTO_INCREMENT 列，必须对其建立索引，并且不能具有 DEFAULT 值。一个 AUTO_INCREMENT 列正常工作，只有当它仅包含正值。插入负数被视为插入非常大的正数。这样做是为了避免当数字从正数到负数换行时出现精度问题，并确保您不会意外得到包含0 的 AUTO_INCREMENT 列。

trans-unit.source: There is a "Haversine" algorithm that is twice as fast as the GCDist function here. But it has a fatal flaw of sometimes returning NULL for the distance between a point and itself. (This is because of computing a number slightly bigger than 1.0, then trying to take the ACOS of it.)
trans-unit.target: 这里有一个 "Haversine "算法,它的速度是GCDist函数的两倍。但它有一个致命的缺陷,就是有时会返回一个点与自身之间距离的NULL。这是因为计算一个比1.0稍大的数字,然后试图取其ACOS)。

trans-unit.source: There is a basic protection against triggers being invoked both on the master and slave. If the master modifies a table that has triggers, it will produce row-based binlog events with the "triggers were invoked for this event" flag. The slave will not invoke any triggers for flagged events.
trans-unit.target: 在主站和从站上都有防止触发器被调用的基本保护措施。如果主站修改了一个有触发器的表,它将产生基于行的binlog事件,并带有 "触发器被该事件调用 "标志。而从站则不会为标记的事件调用任何触发器。

trans-unit.source: There is a new prompt in postConfigure for MariaDB ColumnStore Schema Sync feature. In previous versions, this is defaulted to enabled. Starting in the 1.0.7 version, there is a prompt to the user to give you the option to disable it, in the case you have another application that is doing this functionality. So for upgrade, if you use the upgrade option of '-u', then this feature will be left enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在postConfigure中对MariaDB ColumnStore Schema Sync功能有一个新的提示。在以前的版本中,这个功能默认为启用。从1.0.7版本开始,会有一个提示,让用户可以选择禁用它,以防你有另一个应用程序在做这个功能。所以在升级时,如果你使用'-u'的升级选项,那么这个功能将保持启用状态。

trans-unit.source: There is a single mutex controlling the QC.
trans-unit.target: 有一个mutex控制QC。

trans-unit.source: There is a subtle reason for the LEFT JOIN. If, instead, it were INSERT IGNORE..SELECT DISTINCT, then the INSERT would preallocate auto_increment ids for as many rows as the SELECT provides. This is very likely to "burn" a lot of ids, thereby leading to overflowing MEDIUMINT unnecessarily. The LEFT JOIN leads to finding just the new ids that are needed (except for the rare possibility of a 'simultaneous' insert by another thread). More rationale: Mapping table
trans-unit.target: 左加入有一个微妙的原因。相反，如果它是INSERT IGNORE..SELECT DISTINCT，则INSERT将为SELECT提供的尽可能多的行预分配auto_increment id。这很可能会“刻录”许多id，从而导致不必要的MEDIUMINT溢出。LEFT JOIN导致仅查找所需的新id（除了极少数可能由另一个线程“同时”插入）。更多理由：映射表

trans-unit.source: There is a version specifically for Windows, mysql_install_db.exe.
trans-unit.target: 有一个专门用于Windows的版本 mysql_install_db.exe 。

trans-unit.source: There is also a CASE statement, which differs from the CASE operator described here.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个CASE语句，它不同于此处描述的CASE运算符。

trans-unit.source: There is also a corresponding information_schema table, called ALL_PLUGINS, which contains more complete information.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个对应的 information_schema 表，称为 ALL_PLUGINS ，其中包含更完整的信息。

trans-unit.source: There is also a global history list of the data. When a transaction is committed, its history is added to this history list. The order of the list is the chronological order of the commits.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个数据的全局历史列表。当一个事务被提交时,它的历史记录会被添加到这个历史列表中。列表的顺序是按照提交的时间顺序。

trans-unit.source: There is also a mechanism in place to ensure that higher priority connections are not monopolizing the worker threads in the pool (which would cause indefinite delays for low priority connections). On Unix, low priority connections are put into the high priority queue after the timeout specified by the thread_pool_prio_kickup_timer system variable.
trans-unit.target: 还有一种机制可以确保较高优先级的连接不会独占池中的工作线程（这将导致低优先级连接的不确定的延迟）。在Unix上，在 thread_pool_prio_kickup_timer 系统变量指定的超时之后，将低优先级连接放入高优先级队列。

trans-unit.source: There is also a special value that can be specified:
trans-unit.target: 还可以指定一个特殊的值。

trans-unit.source: There is also an IF statement, which differs from the IF() function described above.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个IF语句，它不同于上述的 IF() 函数。

trans-unit.source: There is also some extra data stored in Cassandra (e.g. hit counters)
trans-unit.target: 还有一些额外的数据存储在Cassandra中(如命中率计数器)。

trans-unit.source: There is an extra day (03-16 thru 04-16): The latest day is only partially full.
trans-unit.target: 有多一天(03-16至04-16)。最近一天只有部分满员。

trans-unit.source: There is an important difference between using IS TRUE or comparing a value with TRUE using =. When using =, only 1 equals to TRUE. But when using IS TRUE, all values which are logically true (like a number > 1) return TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 使用IS TRUE或使用 = 比较值与TRUE之间有重要区别。当使用 = 时，只有 1 等于TRUE。但是，当使用IS TRUE时，所有逻辑上正确的值（例如> 1的数字）都将返回TRUE。

trans-unit.source: There is an online EXPLAIN Analyzer that you can use to share EXPLAIN and EXPLAIN EXTENDED output with others.
trans-unit.target: 有一个在线EXPLAIN分析器，可用于与其他人共享 EXPLAIN 和 EXPLAIN EXTENDED 输出。

trans-unit.source: There is an optional columnstoreBackup.config file that when placed in the same directory as the columnstoreBackup executable will allow you to configure an incremental backup option that uses the rsync link-dest option to enable incremental backups. These are stored in backup.1 thru backup.[n-1] from newest to oldest. The columnstoreBackup.config file should only contain a single line:
trans-unit.target: 有一个可选的columnstoreBackup.config文件,当它与columnstoreBackup可执行文件放置在同一目录下时,将允许你配置一个增量备份选项,使用rsync link-dest选项来启用增量备份。这些备份存储在 backup.1 thru backup.[n-1]中,从最新到最旧。columnstoreBackup.config文件应该只包含一行。

trans-unit.source: There is currently no listener thread in the thread group. For example, if the thread_pool_dedicated_listener system variable is not enabled, then the thread group's listener thread can became a worker thread, so that it could handle some client connection request. In this case, the new thread can become the thread group's listener thread.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程组中没有侦听器线程。例如，如果未启用 thread_pool_dedicated_listener 系统变量，则线程组的侦听器线程可以成为工作线程，从而可以处理某些客户端连接请求。在这种情况下，新线程可以成为线程组的侦听器线程。

trans-unit.source: There is currently no way to drop a column family. RocksDB supports this internally but MyRocks doesn't provide any way to do it.
trans-unit.target: 目前还没有办法删除一个列族。RocksDB内部支持这个功能,但MyRocks并没有提供任何方法来实现这个功能。

trans-unit.source: There is however a problem when a newer MySQL slave replicates against a newer MariaDB master with checksums enabled. The slave server looks at the master server version to know whether events include checksums or not, and MySQL has not yet been updated to learn that MariaDB does this already from version 5.3.0 (as of the time of writing, MySQL 5.6.2). Thus, if MariaDB at least version 5.3.0 but less that 5.6.1 is used as a master with binlog checksums enabled, a MySQL slave will interpret the received events incorrectly as it does not realise the last part of the events is the checksum. So replication will fail with an error about corrupt events or even silent corruption of replicated data in unlucky cases. This requires changes to the MySQL server to fix.
trans-unit.target: 然而,当一个较新的MySQL从服务器对一个较新的MariaDB主服务器进行复制并启用了校验码时,就会出现一个问题。从站服务器会查看主站服务器的版本来了解事件是否包含校验和,而MySQL还没有更新到MariaDB从5.3.0版本开始就已经这样做了(在写这篇文章的时候,MySQL 5.6.2)。因此,如果MariaDB至少是5.3.0版本,但小于5.6.1版本的MariaDB被用作启用binlog校验和的主站,MySQL的从站将错误地解释接收到的事件,因为它没有意识到事件的最后一部分是校验和。所以复制会失败,并出现关于损坏事件的错误,甚至在不幸运的情况下,复制的数据会无声无息地损坏。这需要对MySQL服务器进行修改才能解决。

trans-unit.source: There is however one issue with multiple caches: dropping and altering procedures. Normally, this should be a very rare event in a running system; it's typically something you do during development and testing, so it's not unthinkable that we would simply ignore the issue and let any threads running with a cached version of an SP keep doing so until its disconnected. But assuming we want to keep the caches consistent with respect to drop and alter, it can be done:
trans-unit.target: 然而,多个缓存有一个问题:放弃和改变程序。通常情况下,这在运行中的系统中应该是一个非常罕见的事件;这通常是你在开发和测试过程中所做的事情,所以我们可以简单地忽略这个问题,让任何使用SP的缓存版本运行的线程继续这样做,直到它被断开连接。但假设我们想让缓存在drop和alter方面保持一致,那是可以做到的。

trans-unit.source: There is no "Gap Locking" which makes Statement Based Replication unsafe (See MyRocks and Replication).
trans-unit.target: 没有 "间隙锁定",这使得基于声明的复制不安全(参见MyRocks和复制)。

trans-unit.source: There is no %s row in %s trigger
trans-unit.target: 在%s触发器中没有%s行。

trans-unit.source: There is no optimizer_switch flag for this optimization.
trans-unit.target: 没有用于此优化的optimizer_switch标志。

trans-unit.source: There is no WHERE clause or the WHERE is used with a constant for all prefix parts of the key before the argument to MIN()/MAX().
trans-unit.target: 在 MIN() / MAX() 的参数之前，没有 WHERE 子句或 WHERE 与键的所有前缀部分的常量一起使用。

trans-unit.source: There is no concept of “no default value” in the standard. Instead, a column always has an implicit default value of NULL. On insertion it might however fail the NOT NULL constraint. MariaDB and MySQL instead mark such a column as “not having a default value”. The end result is the same — a value must be specified explicitly or an INSERT will fail.
trans-unit.target: 标准中没有“没有默认值”的概念。而是，列始终具有隐式默认值NULL。但是，在插入时，它可能无法通过NOT NULL约束。相反，MariaDB和MySQL将此类列标记为“没有默认值”。最终结果是相同的-必须显式指定一个值，否则INSERT将失败。

trans-unit.source: There is no conflict resolution. The assumption is that there are no conflicts in data between the different masters.
trans-unit.target: 没有解决冲突。假设不同的主数据之间不存在冲突。

trans-unit.source: There is no data block pinging between participating Performance Module nodes, (as sometimes occurs in other multi-instance/shared disk database systems).
trans-unit.target: 在参与的性能模块节点之间没有数据块ping,(如其他多实例/共享磁盘数据库系统中有时出现的情况)。

trans-unit.source: There is no direct 1-to-1 mapping between Cassandra's datatypes and MySQL/MariaDB datatypes. Also, Cassandra's size limitations are often more relaxed than MySQL/MariaDB's. For example, Cassandra's limit on rowkey length is about 2G, while MySQL limits unique key length to about 1.5Kb.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra的数据类型和MySQL/MariaDB的数据类型之间没有直接的1对1映射。另外,Cassandra的大小限制往往比MySQL/MariaDB更宽松。例如,Cassandra对行键长度的限制约为2G,而MySQL对唯一键长度的限制约为1.5Kb。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that these values are consecutive or even increasing, only that they are unique MariaDB CoumnStore will assign this column a unique value for each row that:
trans-unit.target: 不能保证这些值是连续的,甚至是递增的,只能保证这些值是唯一的,MariaDB CoumnStore将为每一条记录分配一个唯一的值,。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to list all flags - only those that are specified in the command will be affected.
trans-unit.target: 不需要列出所有的标志,只有命令中指定的标志才会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: There is no perfect number for wsrep_slave_threads; it varies with number of CPU cores, client connections, etc. A few dozen is likely to be optimal. Hence, this allows a significant degree of write scaling. If you are I/O-bound, that would be a scaling limitation.
trans-unit.target: wsrep_slave_threads并没有一个完美的数字,它会随着CPU核数、客户端连接数等而变化。几十条可能是最佳的。因此,这允许在很大程度上进行写扩展。如果你是I/O绑定的,那将是一个扩展限制。

trans-unit.source: There is no separate @@optimizer_switch flag for DuplicateWeedout. The strategy can be disabled by switching off all semi-join optimizations with SET @@optimizer_switch='optimizer_semijoin=off' command.
trans-unit.target: DuplicateWeedout 没有单独的@@ optimizer_switch标志。可以通过使用 SET @@optimizer_switch='optimizer_semijoin=off' 命令关闭所有半联接优化来禁用该策略。

trans-unit.source: There is no separate @@optimizer_switch flag for table pullout. Table pullout can be disabled by switching off all semi-join optimizations with SET @@optimizer_switch='semijoin=off' command.
trans-unit.target: 表提取没有单独的@@ optimizer_switch标志。通过使用 SET @@optimizer_switch='semijoin=off' 命令关闭所有半联接优化，可以禁用表提取。

trans-unit.source: There is no simple SQL statement to "drop partitions older than 30 days" or "add a new partition for tomorrow". It would be tedious to do this by hand every day.
trans-unit.target: 没有简单的SQL语句来 "删除超过30天的分区 "或 "为明天添加一个新分区"。如果每天都用手去做,那就太乏味了。

trans-unit.source: There is no statement analysis or rewrite of any kind, that is, if one specifies "db1.tbl" in the statement explicitly, that occurrence won't be changed to "db2.tbl".
trans-unit.target: 没有任何形式的语句分析或重写，也就是说，如果在语句中明确指定“ db1.tbl ”，则该事件不会更改为“ db2.tbl ”。

trans-unit.source: There is no such grant defined for user '%s' on host '%s'
trans-unit.target: 在'%s'主机上,没有为用户'%s'定义这样的授权。

trans-unit.source: There is no symbolic link from mariabackup to innobackupex, as there is for xtrabackup. Instead, mariabackup has the --innobackupex command-line option to enable innobackupex-compatible options.
trans-unit.target: 从 mariabackup 到 innobackupex 没有符号链接，就像 xtrabackup 一样。相反， mariabackup 具有 --innobackupex 命令行选项以启用与innobackupex兼容的选项。

trans-unit.source: There is no way for the handler to know if the foreign database or table has changed. The reason for this is that this database has to work like a data file that would never be written to by anything other than the database. The integrity of the data in the local table could be breached if there was any change to the foreign database.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序没有办法知道外来数据库或表是否发生了变化。原因是这个数据库必须像一个数据文件一样工作,除了数据库之外,其他任何东西都不会被写入。如果外来数据库有任何变化,本地表中数据的完整性就会被破坏。

trans-unit.source: There is no way to replicate data from MySQL/MariaDB into Cassandra. It would be nice if one could update data in MySQL and that would cause appropriate inserts made into all relevant column families in Cassandra.
trans-unit.target: 没有办法将数据从MySQL/MariaDB复制到Cassandra中。如果能在MySQL中更新数据,并将其适当插入Cassandra中的所有相关列系,那就更好了。

trans-unit.source: There is not currently a table option to set different InnoDB page compression algorithms for individual tables.
trans-unit.target: 目前还没有一个表选项可以为各个表设置不同的InnoDB页面压缩算法。

trans-unit.source: There is nothing that suggests that your subquery trick should make the difference and assure the deterministic result you are hoping for.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何迹象表明,你的子查询技巧应该有所区别,并保证你所希望的确定性结果。

trans-unit.source: There is only one possibly matching row in the table. The row is read before the optimization phase and all columns in the table are treated as constants.
trans-unit.target: 表中只有一条可能匹配的行。该行在优化阶段前被读取,表中所有列都被视为常量。

trans-unit.source: There is only one table used in the SELECT.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 中仅使用一个表。

trans-unit.source: There is only one way to apply the IN->EXISTS strategy and MySQL will do it unconditionally. With FirstMatch, the optimizer can make a choice between whether it should run the FirstMatch strategy as soon as all tables used in the subquery are in the join prefix, or at some later point in time. (TODO: example)
trans-unit.target: 只有一种方法可以应用 IN->EXISTS 策略，而MySQL将无条件地这样做。使用 FirstMatch ，优化器可以选择是否在子查询中使用的所有表都在 FirstMatch 中后立即运行FirstMatch策略，还是在稍后的某个时间点运行。（TODO：示例）

trans-unit.source: Therefore connections to the MariaDB server must be made using TCP, even when the client is running on the same machine as the server container.
trans-unit.target: 因此,即使客户端与服务器容器运行在同一台机器上,与MariaDB服务器的连接也必须使用TCP。

trans-unit.source: Therefore we need specific functions to do so. They are introduced now.
trans-unit.target: 因此,我们需要特定的功能来实现。现在介绍这些功能。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a counter-intuitive solution to the Row size too large error in a lot of cases is actually to increase the length of some variable-length columns, so that InnoDB's row format can store them on overflow pages.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在许多情况下，针对行大小过大的错误采取反直觉的解决方案实际上是增加一些可变长度列的长度，以便InnoDB的行格式可以将它们存储在溢出页面上。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a potential solution to the Row size too large error is to convert some columns to the BLOB or TEXT data types.
trans-unit.target: 因此，解决行大小过大错误的可能方法是将某些列转换为 BLOB 或 TEXT 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a potential solution to the Row size too large error is to convert the table to use the DYNAMIC row format. For example:
trans-unit.target: 因此，解决行大小过大错误的可能方法是将表转换为使用 DYNAMIC 行格式。例如：

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a potential solution to the Row size too large error is to ensure that all VARBINARY columns are at least as long as varbinary(256).
trans-unit.target: 因此，解决行大小太大错误的可能方法是确保所有 VARBINARY 列的长度至少与 varbinary(256) 一样长。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a potential solution to the Row size too large error is to ensure that all VARCHAR columns are at least as long as 256 bytes. The number of characters required to reach the 256 byte limit depends on the character set used by the column.
trans-unit.target: 因此，解决行大小太大错误的可能方法是确保所有 VARCHAR 列的长度至少为256个字节。达到256字节限制所需的字符数取决于列使用的字符集。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the main difference is to be able to define the columns of VIR tables. Unfortunately, there are currently many limitations to virtual columns that hopefully should be removed in the future.
trans-unit.target: 因此,主要的区别是能够定义VIR表的列。遗憾的是,目前对虚拟列有很多限制,希望将来能取消。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, their data is "precious" and should not be modified except by specific commands such as INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE. For other commands such as CREATE, DROP, or ALTER their data is never modified or erased.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它们的数据是“宝贵的”，除非通过诸如INSERT，UPDATE或DELETE之类的特定命令，否则不应对其进行修改。对于其他命令，例如CREATE，DROP或ALTER，它们的数据永远不会被修改或擦除。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using “Jbin” argument functions, in addition to being faster and using less memory, are also safer when dealing with json files that should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在处理不应修改的json文件时，使用“ Jbin”自变量函数除了速度更快，使用内存更少外，还更安全。

trans-unit.source: These tables can be used to measure the effectiveness of XtraDB/InnoDB compression, per table or per index. The values in these tables show which tables perform better with index compression, and which tables cause too many compression failures or perform too many compression/uncompression operations. When compression performs badly for a table, this might mean that you should change its KEY_BLOCK_SIZE, or that the table should not be compressed.
trans-unit.target: 这些表可用于评估每个表或每个索引的XtraDB / InnoDB压缩的有效性。这些表中的值显示哪些表在索引压缩中表现更好，哪些表导致太多的压缩失败或执行太多的压缩/解压缩操作。当压缩对表的执行效果很差时，这可能意味着您应该更改其 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE ，或者不应压缩该表。

trans-unit.source: These tables can be used to measure the effectiveness of XtraDB/InnoDB table compression. When you have to decide a value for KEY_BLOCK_SIZE, you can create more than one version of the table (one for each candidate value) and run a realistic workload on them. Then, these tables can be used to see how the operations performed with different page sizes.

trans-unit.source: These variables give the binary log file and position like SHOW MASTER STATUS does. But they can be queried in a transactionally consistent way. After starting a transaction using START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT, the two variables will give the binlog position corresponding to the state of the database of the consistent snapshot so taken, irrespectively of which other transactions have been committed since the snapshot was taken (SHOW MASTER STATUS always shows the position of the last committed transaction). This works for MVCC storage engines that implement the commit ordering part of the storage engine API, which at the time of writing is XtraDB and PBXT.

trans-unit.source: Think of a list of names, sorted by last_name, then first_name. You have undoubtedly seen such lists, and they often have other information such as address and phone number. Suppose you wanted to look me up. If you remember my full name ('James' and 'Rick'), it is easy to find my entry. If you remembered only my last name ('James') and first initial ('R'). You would quickly zoom in on the Jameses and find the Rs in them. There, you might remember 'Rick' and ignore 'Ronald'. But, suppose you remembered my first name ('Rick') and only my last initial ('J'). Now you are in trouble. You would be scanning all the Js -- Jones, Rick; Johnson, Rick; Jamison, Rick; etc, etc. That's much less efficient.
trans-unit.target: 想象一下一份名单,先按姓,再按名排序。你无疑见过这样的名单,它们通常还有其他信息,如地址和电话号码。假设你想找我。如果你记得我的全名('James'和'Rick'),很容易找到我的条目。如果你只记得我的姓('James')和首字母('R')。你会迅速放大詹姆斯的名字,找到其中的R。在那里,你可能会记住'Rick'而忽略'Ronald'。但是,假设你记住了我的名字('Rick'),却只记住了我最后的首字母('J')。现在你就麻烦了。你会扫描所有的J--Jones,Rick;Johnson,Rick;Jamison,Rick;等等等等。这样效率就低多了。

trans-unit.source: Third, there can be a situation when the server thinks that the table exists (it found and successfully read the .frm file), but from the engine point of view the .frm file is incorrect. For example, the table was already deleted from the engine, or its definition was modified (again, modified only in the engine). In this case the .frm file is outdated, and the server needs to re-discover the table. The engine conveys this to the server by returning HA_ERR_TABLE_DEF_CHANGED error code from the handler's open() method. On receiving this error the server will use the discover() method to get the new .frm image. This also means that after the table is opened, the server does not expect its metadata to change. The engine thus should ensure (with some kind of locking, perhaps) that a table metadata cannot be modified, as long as the table stays opened.
trans-unit.target: 第三，服务器可能认为该表存在（找到并成功读取了 .frm 文件），但是从引擎的角度来看， .frm 文件不正确。例如，该表已从引擎中删除，或者其定义已被修改（再次仅在引擎中被修改）。在这种情况下， .frm 文件已过时，服务器需要重新发现该表。引擎通过从处理程序的open（）方法返回 HA_ERR_TABLE_DEF_CHANGED 错误代码将其传达给服务器。收到此错误后，服务器将使用 discover() 方法获取新的 .frm 映像。这也意味着，后在打开表后，服务器不会期望其元数据发生更改。因此，引擎应该确保（可能以某种形式的锁定）只要表保持打开状态就不能修改表元数据。

trans-unit.source: Third, to allow plugin sources to be simply copied into the plugin/ or storage/ directories, and still not affect existing tests (even if new plugins are statically linked into the server), mtr automatically disables all optional plugins on server startup. A plugin is optional if it can be disabled with the corresponding --skip-XXX server command-line option. Mandatory plugins, like MyISAM or MEMORY, do not have --skip-XXX options (e.g. there is no --skip-myisam option). This mtr behavior means that no plugin, statically or dynamically built, has any effect on the server unless it was explicitly enabled. A convenient way to enable a given plugin XXX for specific tests is to create a have_XXX.opt file which contains the necessary command-line options, and a have_XXX.inc file which checks whether a plugin was loaded. Then any test that needs this plugin can source the have_XXX.inc file and have the plugin loaded automatically.
trans-unit.target: 第三，为了允许将插件源简单地复制到 plugin/ 或 storage/ 目录中，并且仍然不影响现有测试（即使将新插件静态链接到服务器中），mtr会在服务器启动时自动禁用所有可选插件。如果可以使用相应的 --skip-XXX 服务器命令行选项禁用插件，则该插件是可选的。强制性插件，例如MyISAM或MEMORY，没有 --skip-XXX 选项（例如，没有 --skip-myisam 选项）。这种mtr行为意味着，除非明确启用，否则静态或动态构建的插件都不会对服务器产生任何影响。启用给定插件XXX的便捷方法对于特定的测试是创建一个 have_XXX.opt 文件，它包含了必要的命令行选项，和一个 have_XXX.inc 其中检查是否一个插件加载文件。然后，需要此插件的任何测试都可以获取 have_XXX.inc 文件并自动加载该插件。

trans-unit.source: This SST method uses the Mariabackup utility for performing SSTs. It is one of the two non-locking methods. Note that if you use the mariabackup SST method, then you also need to have socat installed on the server. This is needed to stream the backup from the donor to the joiner. This is a limitation inherited from the xtrabackup-v2 SST method.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is used for very small tables when the overhead of the rowid-merge algorithm is not justifiable. Since this strategy doesn't need any in-memory buffers, it is also used when there is not enough memory to hold the indexes of the rowid-merge strategy.

trans-unit.source: This automatic initialization for INSERT and UPDATE queries can also be explicitly enabled for a column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type by specifying the DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP clauses for the column. In these clauses, any synonym of CURRENT_TIMESTAMP is accepted, including CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), NOW(), LOCALTIME, LOCALTIME(), LOCALTIMESTAMP, and LOCALTIMESTAMP().
trans-unit.target: 通过为列指定 DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 和 ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 子句，还可以为使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列显式启用 INSERT 和 UPDATE 查询的自动初始化。在这些条款中，将接受 CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 的任何同义词，包括 CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() ， NOW() ， LOCALTIME ， LOCALTIME() ， LOCALTIMESTAMP 和 LOCALTIMESTAMP() 。

trans-unit.source: This automatic initialization for INSERT queries can also be explicitly disabled for a column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type by specifying a constant DEFAULT value. For example, DEFAULT 0.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定常量 DEFAULT 值，还可以为使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列显式禁用 INSERT 查询的自动初始化。例如， DEFAULT 0 。

trans-unit.source: This automatic initialization for NULL values can also be explicitly disabled for a column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type by specifying the NULL attribute for the column. In this case, if the column's value is set to NULL, then the column's value will actually be set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 通过为列指定 NULL 属性，还可以为使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列显式禁用 NULL 值的自动初始化。在这种情况下，如果该列的值设置为 NULL ，则该列的值实际上将设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: This automatic initialization for UPDATE queries can also be explicitly disabled for a column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type by specifying a DEFAULT clause for the column, but no ON UPDATE clause. If a DEFAULT clause is explicitly specified for a column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type, but an ON UPDATE clause is not specified for the column, then the timestamp value will not automatically change when an UPDATE statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: 通过为列指定 DEFAULT 子句，但不指定 ON UPDATE 子句，也可以为使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列显式禁用 UPDATE 查询的自动初始化。如果为使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列显式指定了 DEFAULT 子句，但未为该列指定 ON UPDATE 子句，则执行 UPDATE 语句时，时间戳记值将不会自动更改。

trans-unit.source: This backs up all databases into the target directory /var/mariadb/backup. If you look in that directory at the xtrabackup_checkpoints file, you can see the LSN data provided by InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 这 /var/mariadb/backup 所有数据库备份到目标目录/ var / mariadb / backup中。如果您在 xtrabackup_checkpoints 文件中查看该目录，则可以看到InnoDB提供的LSN数据。

trans-unit.source: This backup acquires a global read lock on all tables (using FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK) at the beginning of the dump. As soon as this lock has been acquired, the binary log coordinates are read and the lock is released. If long updating statements are running when the FLUSH statement is issued, the MariaDB server may get stalled until those statements finish. After that, the dump becomes lock free and does not disturb reads and writes on the tables. If the update statements that the MariaDB server receives are short (in terms of execution time), the initial lock period should not be noticeable, even with many updates.
trans-unit.target: 此备份在转储开始时获取所有表上的全局读取锁定（使用 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK ）。一旦获取了此锁，便会读取二进制日志坐标并释放该锁。如果在发出FLUSH语句时正在运行长时间的更新语句，则MariaDB服务器可能会停滞，直到这些语句完成。之后，转储将变为无锁状态，并且不会干扰对表的读取和写入。如果MariaDB服务器收到的更新语句很短（就执行时间而言），则即使有很多更新，初始锁定期也应该不会很明显。

trans-unit.source: This became a bigger issue in MariaDB 10.1 when the MySQL-wsrep patch that powers MariaDB Galera Cluster was enabled on most MariaDB builds on Linux by default. Consequently, this built-in wsrep plugin would exist on those MariaDB builds on Linux by default. Therefore, MariaDB users might pay a performance penalty, even if they never actually intended to use the MariaDB Galera Cluster features included in MariaDB 10.1.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在大多数基于Linux的MariaDB构建中启用了支持MariaDB Galera Cluster的MySQL-wsrep补丁时，这在MariaDB 10.1中成为了一个更大的问题。因此，默认情况下，此内置 wsrep 插件将存在于Linux上的那些MariaDB构建中。因此，即使MariaDB用户从未真正打算使用MariaDB 10.1中包含的MariaDB Galera Cluster功能，也可能会付出性能损失。

trans-unit.source: This becomes especially beneficial if there is a LIMIT.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一个LIMIT,这就变得特别有利。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed with special options that take the form --plugin-name. For example, for the server_audit audit plugin, the special option is called --server-audit.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过采用 --plugin-name 形式的特殊选项来更改此行为。例如，对于 server_audit 审计插件，特殊选项称为 --server-audit 。

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from the behavior of the COMPACT row format, which always stores the column prefix on the main page. This allows tables using the COMPRESSED row format to contain a high number of columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不同于 COMPACT 行格式的行为，后者总是将列前缀存储在主页上。这允许使用 COMPRESSED 行格式的表包含使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的大量列。

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from the behavior of the COMPACT row format, which always stores the column prefix on the main page. This allows tables using the DYNAMIC row format to contain a high number of columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不同于 COMPACT 行格式的行为，后者总是将列前缀存储在主页上。这允许使用 DYNAMIC 行格式的表包含使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的大量列。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is automatic and well suited for series, ordered, patterned and time-based data, where the data is loaded frequently and often referenced by time. Any column with clustered values is a good candidate for Extent Elimination.
trans-unit.target: 这种行为是自动的,很适合于系列、有序、模式化和基于时间的数据,在这些数据中,数据被频繁加载,并且经常被时间引用。任何具有聚类值的列都是Extent Elimination的良好候选者。

trans-unit.source: This blog assumes you know the basic idea behind having an INDEX. Here is a refresher on some of the key points.
trans-unit.target: 这篇博客假设你知道有一个INDEX背后的基本想法。下面是一些关键点的复习。

trans-unit.source: This blog is the consolidation of a Percona tutorial I gave in 2013, plus many years of experience in fixing thousands of slow queries on hundreds of systems. I apologize that this does not tell you how create INDEXes for all SELECTs. Some are just too complex.
trans-unit.target: 这篇博客是我在2013年给大家讲的Percona教程的整合,再加上多年在上百个系统上修复上千个慢查询的经验。我很抱歉,这并没有告诉你如何为所有的SELECT创建INDEX。有些实在是太复杂了。

trans-unit.source: This calculation should assign client connections to each thread group in a round-robin manner. In general, this should result in an even distribution of client connections among thread groups.
trans-unit.target: 这种计算方式应该以循环的方式将客户端连接分配给每个线程组。一般来说,这样做的结果应该是客户机连接在线程组之间均匀分布。

trans-unit.source: This can also be configured for Active Directory authentication.
trans-unit.target: 也可以为Active Directory身份验证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: This can be a very big win if most of your queries are short running queries and there are few table/row locks in your system.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的大部分查询都是短时运行的查询,并且系统中的表/行锁很少,那么这将是一个非常大的胜利。

trans-unit.source: This can be an 'anti-self join', for example:
trans-unit.target: 比如说,这可以是一种 "反自我加入"。

trans-unit.source: This can be avoided by setting slave_domain_parallel_threads to a number that is lower than slave_parallel_threads. When set different from zero, each replication domain in one master connection can reserve at most that many worker threads at any one time, leaving the rest (up to the value of slave_parallel_threads) free for other master connections or replication domains to use in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将slave_domain_parallel_threads设置为小于 slave_parallel_threads 的数字来避免这种情况。如果将其设置为非零值，则一个主连接中的每个复制域可以一次最多保留多个工作线程，而其余的线程（最多达到slave_parallel_threads的值）可以自由供其他主连接或复制域并行使用。

Thus any replication test that uses innodb will be run six times.

trans-unit.source: This case is clean and simple, but it can clutter the summary table because multiple rows can occur for a given (foo, dy) pair. The report will always have to SUM() up values because it cannot assume there is only one row, even when it is reporting on a single `foo` for a single `dy`. This forced-SUM is not really bad -- you should do it anyway; that way all your reports are written with one pattern.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况简单明了，但由于给定（foo，dy）对可能会出现多行，因此可能使摘要表混乱。报告将始终必须求和（SUM（）），因为它不能假设只有一行，即使它是针对单个dy报告单个foo时也是如此。这个强制求和并不是很糟糕-无论如何，您应该这样做；这样，您的所有报告都将以一种模式编写。

trans-unit.source: This consistent binlog order is used by the slave to keep track of its current position in the replication. Basically, the slave remembers the GTID of the last event group replicated from the master. When reconnecting to a master, whether the same one or a new one, it sends this GTID position to the master, and the master starts sending events from the first event after the corresponding event group.
trans-unit.target: 这种一致的 binlog 顺序被从机用来跟踪其在复制中的当前位置。基本上,从站会记住从主站复制的最后一个事件组的GTID。当重新连接到主站时,不管是同一个主站还是新的主站,它都会将这个GTID位置发送给主站,主站从对应事件组之后的第一个事件开始发送事件。

trans-unit.source: This feature can improve the performance of row-based replication on tables that do not have a primary key (or other unique key), but which do have another index that can help locate rows to update or delete. With this feature, index cardinality information from ANALYZE TABLE is considered when selecting the index to use (before this feature is implemented, the first index was selected unconditionally).
trans-unit.target: 此功能可以提高没有主键（或其他唯一键）但具有另一个索引的表上基于行的复制的性能，该索引可以帮助找到要更新或删除的行。使用此功能时，在选择要使用的索引时会考虑来自 ANALYZE TABLE 的索引基数信息（在实现此功能之前，无条件选择了第一个索引）。

trans-unit.source: This feature has been removed from recent versions of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 该功能已从MariaDB的最新版本中删除。

trans-unit.source: This feature implements the new commit ordering storage engine API in PBXT. With this feature, it is possible to use START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT and get consistency among transactions which involve both XtraDB and InnoDB. (Without this feature, there is no such consistency guarantee. For example, even after running START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT it was still possible for the InnoDB/XtraDB part of some transaction T to be visible and the PBXT part of the same transaction T to not be visible.)
trans-unit.target: 此功能在PBXT中实现了新的提交顺序存储引擎API。借助此功能，可以使用具有一致 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 并在涉及XtraDB和InnoDB的事务之间获得一致性。（如果没有这项功能，也没有这种一致性保证。例如，即使后运行 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 但仍有可能对一些事务的InnoDB / XtraDB部分牛逼是可见的，在同一个事务的PBXT部分牛逼到不可见。）

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to implement application locks or to simulate record locks. Names are locked on a server-wide basis. If a name has been locked by one client, GET_LOCK() blocks any request by another client for a lock with the same name. This allows clients that agree on a given lock name to use the name to perform cooperative advisory locking. But be aware that it also allows a client that is not among the set of cooperating clients to lock a name, either inadvertently or deliberately, and thus prevent any of the cooperating clients from locking that name. One way to reduce the likelihood of this is to use lock names that are database-specific or application-specific. For example, use lock names of the form db_name.str or app_name.str.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可用于实现应用程序锁定或模拟记录锁定。名称在服务器范围内被锁定。如果名称已被一个客户端锁定，则 GET_LOCK() 会阻止另一客户端对具有相同名称的锁的任何请求。这允许在给定锁名称上达成一致的客户端使用该名称执行协作建议锁定。但是请注意，它还允许不在协作客户端集合中的客户端无意或故意锁定名称，从而防止任何协作客户端锁定该名称。降低这种可能性的一种方法是使用特定于数据库或特定于应用程序的锁名。例如，使用 db_name.str 或 app_name.str 形式的锁名。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful in replication for controlling master/slave synchronization. It blocks until the slave has read and applied all updates up to the specified position (log_name,log_pos) in the master log. The return value is the number of log events the slave had to wait for to advance to the specified position. The function returns NULL if the slave SQL thread is not started, the slave's master information is not initialized, the arguments are incorrect, or an error occurs. It returns -1 if the timeout has been exceeded. If the slave SQL thread stops while MASTER_POS_WAIT() is waiting, the function returns NULL. If the slave is past the specified position, the function returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 此功能对于控制主/从同步的复制很有用。它会阻塞，直到从属已读取并应用所有更新到主日志中的指定位置（ log_name,log_pos ）。返回值是从站必须等待前进到指定位置的日志事件数。如果未启动从属SQL线程，未初始化从属主信息，参数不正确或发生错误，则该函数返回NULL。如果已超过超时，则返回-1。如果在 MASTER_POS_WAIT() 等待时从SQL线程停止，则该函数返回NULL。如果从站经过指定位置，则该函数立即返回。

trans-unit.source: This guide has been written for the DBA, developer and operator to help you stand up Platform X3 for HTAP queries, unleashing the ability to perform analysis across events as they are happening. It is also a deployment that can scale from the small cluster of the examples below to accommodate more transactions, larger analytical processing and high availability.

trans-unit.source: This incompatible change had a non-obvious consequence. If a user had been explicitly specifying cipher suites to disable old and obsolete TLS protocol version, then that user may have also inadvertently prevented TLSv1.3 from working, unless the user remembered to add the TLSv1.3 cipher suites to their cipher list. After upgrading to OpenSSL 1.1.1, this user might believe they are using TLSv1.3, when their existing cipher suite configuration might be preventing it.
trans-unit.target: 这种不兼容的改变有一个不明显的后果。如果用户明确指定了密码套件来禁用老的和过时的TLS协议版本,那么该用户也可能无意中阻止了TLSv1.3的工作,除非该用户记得将TLSv1.3密码套件添加到他们的密码列表中。在升级到OpenSSL 1.1.1后,该用户可能认为他们正在使用TLSv1.3,而他们现有的密码套件配置可能会阻止它。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the one or more client connections currently using the active worker threads may be monopolizing the thread group, and preventing the queued client connections from performing work. When the timer thread detects that a thread group is stalled, it wakes up a sleeping worker thread in the thread group, if one is available. If there isn't one, then it creates a new worker thread in the thread group. This temporarily allows several client connections in the thread group to run in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 这表明当前正在使用活动工作线程的一个或多个客户端连接可能会垄断线程组，并阻止排队的客户端连接执行工作。当计时器线程检测到某个线程组已停止时，它将唤醒线程组中的一个睡眠工作线程（如果有）。如果没有，那么它将在线程组中创建一个新的工作线程。这暂时允许线程组中的多个客户端连接并行运行。

trans-unit.source: This is a major upgrade, and so complete database backups are strongly suggested before you begin. MariaDB 10.1 is compatible on disk and wire with MySQL 5.5, and the MariaDB developer team has done extensive development and testing to make upgrades as painless and trouble-free as possible. Even so, it's always a good idea to do regular backups, especially before an upgrade. As the database has to shutdown anyway for the upgrade, this is a good opportunity to do a backup!
trans-unit.target: 这是一项重大升级，因此强烈建议您在开始之前进行完整的数据库备份。MariaDB 10.1在磁盘和线路上均与MySQL 5.5兼容，并且MariaDB开发人员团队已进行了广泛的开发和测试，以使升级尽可能轻松，无故障。即使这样，进行定期备份（尤其是在升级之前）始终是个好主意。由于无论如何升级都必须关闭数据库，因此这是进行备份的好机会！

trans-unit.source: This is an extended version of the pool-of-threads code from MySQL 6.0. This allows you to use a limited set of threads to handle all queries, instead of the old 'one-thread-per-connection' style. In recent times, its also been referred to as "thread pool" or "thread pooling" as this feature (in a different implementation) is available in Enterprise editions of MySQL (not in the Community edition).
trans-unit.target: 这是MySQL 6.0中线程池代码的扩展版本。这允许你使用一组有限的线程来处理所有的查询,而不是旧的 "每个连接一个线程 "的风格。在最近,它也被称为 "线程池 "或 "线程池",因为这个功能(在不同的实现中)在MySQL的企业版中可用(而不是在社区版中)。

trans-unit.source: This is applying in particular when acting on json files. We have seen that a file was not modified when using the Json_File function as an argument to a modifying function because the modifying function just received a copy of the json file. This is not true when using the Jbin_File function that does not serialize the binary document and make it directly accessible. Also, as we have seen earlier, json functions that modify their first file parameter modify the file and return the file name. This is done by directly serializing the internal binary document as a file.
trans-unit.target: 这在处理json文件时特别适用。我们已经看到，使用Json_File函数作为修改函数的参数时，文件没有被修改，因为修改函数刚刚接收到json文件的副本。当使用不序列化二进制文档并使其直接可访问的Jbin_File函数时，情况并非如此。同样，如我们先前所见，修改其第一个文件参数的json函数将修改文件并返回文件名。通过直接将内部二进制文档序列化为文件来完成此操作。

Reach into the data using seq = (17) to get the row for Andrew Johnson. 3. Deliver the answer (1865-1869). This is much better. In fact this is usually the "best".

trans-unit.source: This is the default isolation level for InnoDB. For consistent reads, there is an important difference from the READ COMMITTED isolation level: All consistent reads within the same transaction read the snapshot established by the first read. This convention means that if you issue several plain (non-locking) SELECT statements within the same transaction, these SELECT statements are consistent also with respect to each other. See http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-consistent-read.html.
trans-unit.target: 这是InnoDB的默认隔离级别。对于一致的读取，与 READ COMMITTED 隔离级别有一个重要的区别：同一事务中的所有一致读取均读取由第一次读取建立的快照。此约定意味着，如果您在同一事务中发出多个普通（非锁定） SELECT 语句，则这些 SELECT 语句彼此之间也是一致的。参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-consistent-read.html。

trans-unit.source: This is the default isolation level for InnoDB. For consistent reads, there is an important difference from the READ COMMITTED isolation level: All consistent reads within the same transaction read the snapshot established by the first read. This convention means that if you issue several plain (non-locking) SELECT statements within the same transaction, these SELECT statements are consistent also with respect to each other. See http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-consistent-read.html.
trans-unit.target: 这是InnoDB的默认隔离级别。对于一致的读取，与 READ COMMITTED 隔离级别有一个重要的区别：同一事务中的所有一致读取均读取由第一次读取建立的快照。此约定意味着，如果您在同一事务中发出多个普通（非锁定） SELECT 语句，则这些 SELECT 语句彼此之间也是一致的。参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-consistent-read.html。

trans-unit.source: This is the default method. This method uses the rsync utility to create a snapshot of the donor node. rsync should be available by default on all modern Linux distributions. The donor node is blocked with a read lock during the SST. This is the fastest SST method, especially for large datasets since it copies binary data. Because of that, this is the recommended SST method if you do not need to allow the donor node to execute queries during the SST.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认方法。此方法使用 rsync 实用程序创建施主节点的快照。默认情况下， rsync 应该在所有现代Linux发行版中都可用。在SST期间，施主节点被读取锁定阻止。这是最快的SST方法，尤其是对于大型数据集，因为它会复制二进制数据。因此，如果您不需要让供体节点在SST期间执行查询，则建议使用SST方法。

trans-unit.source: This is the default method. This method uses the rsync utility to create a snapshot of the donor node. rsync should be available by default on all modern Linux distributions. The donor node is blocked with a read lock during the SST. This is the fastest SST method, especially for large datasets since it copies binary data. Because of that, this is the recommended SST method if you do not need to allow the donor node to execute queries during the SST.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认方法。此方法使用 rsync 实用程序创建施主节点的快照。默认情况下， rsync 应该在所有现代Linux发行版中都可用。在SST期间，施主节点被读取锁定阻止。这是最快的SST方法，特别是对于大型数据集，因为它可以复制二进制数据。因此，如果您不需要让施主节点在SST期间执行查询，则建议使用SST方法。

trans-unit.source: This is the inverse of the DATE_FORMAT() function. It takes a string str and a format string format. STR_TO_DATE() returns a DATETIME value if the format string contains both date and time parts, or a DATE or TIME value if the string contains only date or time parts.
trans-unit.target: 这是 DATE_FORMAT() 函数的反函数。它采用字符串 str 和格式字符串 format 。如果格式字符串同时包含日期和时间部分，则 STR_TO_DATE() 返回 DATETIME 值；如果字符串仅包含日期或时间部分，则STR_TO_DATE（）返回 DATE 或 TIME 值。

trans-unit.source: This is the main method of table discovery, the heart of it. The server invokes it when it wants to use the table. The discover_table() method gets the TABLE_SHARE structure, which is not completely initialized — only the table and the database name (and a path to the table file) are filled in. It should initialize this TABLE_SHARE with the desired table structure.
trans-unit.target: 这是表发现的主要方法，它的核心。服务器在要使用表时调用它。该discover_table（）方法获取 TABLE_SHARE 结构，这是不完全初始化-只有表和数据库名称（表文件的路径）被填充应该初始化这个 TABLE_SHARE 与所需的表结构。

trans-unit.source: This is the most useful way to handle USE in procedures. If we didn't, the caller would find himself in a different database after calling a function, which can be confusing. Restoring the database also gives full freedom to the procedure writer: - It's possible to write "general" procedures that are independent of the actual database name. - It's possible to write procedures that work on a particular database by calling USE, without having to use fully qualified table names everywhere (which doesn't help if you want to call other, "general", procedures anyway).
trans-unit.target: 这是在过程中处理USE最有用的方法。如果我们不这样做,调用者在调用一个函数后会发现自己在不同的数据库中,这会让人感到困惑。恢复数据库也给了过程编写者充分的自由:-可以编写独立于实际数据库名称的 "通用 "过程。-可以通过调用USE来编写在特定数据库上工作的过程,而不必处处使用完全限定的表名(反正要调用其他 "一般 "的过程也没有用)。

trans-unit.source: This is the runtime context in the THD structure. It contains an array of items, the parameters and local variables for the currently executing stored procedure. This means that variable value lookup is in runtime is constant time, a simple index operation.
trans-unit.target: 这是THD结构中的运行时上下文,它包含一个数组,是当前执行的存储过程的参数和局部变量。它包含了一个数组的项目,即当前执行的存储过程的参数和局部变量。这意味着变量值查询在运行时是恒定的时间,是一个简单的索引操作。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to obtain a logical dump/backup with a matching binlog position that can be used to provision a new slave with the original server as the master. First START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT is executed. Then a consistent state of the database is obtained with queries, and the matching binlog position is obtained with SHOW STATUS LIKE 'binlog_snapshot%'. When this is loaded on a new slave server, the binlog position is used in a CHANGE MASTER TO statement to set the slave replicating from the correct position.
trans-unit.target: 这对于获得具有匹配binlog位置的逻辑转储/备份很有用，该逻辑转储/备份可用于以原始服务器为主服务器来提供新的从服务器。执行具有一致 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 第一次启动事务。然后，通过查询获得数据库的一致状态，并使用 SHOW STATUS LIKE 'binlog_snapshot%' 获得匹配的binlog位置。将其加载到新的从属服务器上时，在 CHANGE MASTER TO 语句中使用binlog位置以从正确位置设置从属复制。

Ensure that directories have the "x" (execute) directory permissions for the owner. Ensure that all the parent directories of the datadir upwards have "x" (execute) permissions for all (user, group, and other).
trans-unit.target: 这通常是在写入此文件的目录上的权限错误。确保整个 datadir 由用户自备运行 mysqld ，通常 mysql 。确保目录具有所有者的“ x”（执行）目录权限。确保 datadir 的所有上级父目录都对所有 user （user， group 和 other ）具有“ x”（执行）权限。

Nevertheless, working on a larger table is possible, but only after setting connect_json_grp_size to the ceiling of the number of rows per group for the table. trans-unit.source: This last statement creates the MyISAM table and inserts the original XML data, translated to tabular format by the xsampall2 CONNECT table, into the MariaDB biblio table. Note that further transformation on the data could have been achieved by using a more elaborate Select statement in the Create statement, for instance using filters, alias or applying functions to the data. However, because the Create Table process copies table data, later modifications of the xsample.xml file will not change the biblio table and changes to the biblio table will not modify the xsample.xml file.
trans-unit.target: 最后一条语句创建MyISAM表，并将原始XML数据（由xsampall2 CONNECT表转换为表格格式）插入MariaDB biblio表。请注意，可以通过在Create语句中使用更精细的Select语句来实现对数据的进一步转换，例如，使用过滤器，别名或将函数应用于数据。但是，由于表创建过程将表数据，对后来的修改xsample.xml文件不会改变文献记录表，并转移到文献记录表不会修改xsample.xml文件。

trans-unit.source: This lets one check how close the optimizer's estimates about the query plan are to the reality. ANALYZE produces an overview, while the ANALYZE FORMAT=JSON command provides a more detailed view of the query plan and the query execution.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来，您可以检查优化程序对查询计划的估计与现实之间的接近程度。 ANALYZE 产生概述，而 ANALYZE FORMAT=JSON 命令提供查询计划和查询执行的更详细视图。

trans-unit.source: This lets you change column options.
trans-unit.target: 这可以让你改变列选项。

trans-unit.source: This level is like REPEATABLE READ, but InnoDB implicitly converts all plain SELECT statements to SELECT ... LOCK IN SHARE MODE if autocommit is disabled. If autocommit is enabled, the SELECT is its own transaction. It therefore is known to be read only and can be serialized if performed as a consistent (non-locking) read and need not block for other transactions. (This means that to force a plain SELECT to block if other transactions have modified the selected rows, you should disable autocommit.)
trans-unit.target: 此级别类似于REPEATABLE READ，但如果禁用了 autocommit 则InnoDB会将所有普通的SELECT语句隐式转换为 SELECT ... LOCK IN SHARE MODE 。如果启用了自动提交，则SELECT是它自己的事务。因此，它被认为是只读的，并且如果以一致的（非锁定）读取方式执行并且不需要阻塞其他事务就可以序列化。（这意味着，如果其他事务已修改所选行，则强制普通SELECT阻止，则应禁用自动提交。）

trans-unit.source: This library must export a function GetMYTYPE. The option subtype enables CONNECT to have the name of the exported function and to use the new table type. Other options are interpreted by the OEM type and can also be specified within the option_list option.
trans-unit.target: 该库必须导出函数GetMYTYPE。选项子类型使CONNECT具有导出函数的名称并使用新的表类型。其他选项由OEM类型解释，也可以在option_list选项中指定。

trans-unit.source: This log entry would be on one line, but it's reformatted here for better rendering. Looking at this log entry, you can see the date and time of the query, followed by the server host, the user and host for the account. Next is the connection and query identification numbers (i.e., 15 and 46). After the log event type (i.e., QUERY), the database name (i.e., company), the query, and the error number is recorded.
trans-unit.target: 该日志条目将在一行上，但在此处重新格式化以更好地呈现。查看此日志条目，您可以看到查询的日期和时间，然后是服务器主机，帐户的用户和主机。接下来是连接和查询标识号（即 15 和 46 ）。在日志事件类型（即 QUERY ）之后，将记录数据库名称（即 company ），查询和错误号。

trans-unit.source: This may seem counter-intuitive: why would one need to specify which datatype they're retrieving? Can't the dynamic columns system figure the datatype from the data being stored?
trans-unit.target: 这似乎有悖于直觉:为什么需要指定检索的数据类型?难道动态列系统不能从存储的数据中找出数据类型吗?

trans-unit.source: This may seem rather stupid because it means for instance that a row will be in partition boston if it belongs to the partition boston! However, it works because the partition engine doesn’t know about special columns and behaves as if the city column was a real column.
trans-unit.target: 这可能看起来很愚蠢，因为这意味着，例如，如果行属于分区波士顿，则该行将位于分区波士顿中！但是，它之所以有效，是因为分区引擎不知道特殊列，并且其行为就像city列是真实列。

trans-unit.source: This may sometimes be risky. If the pivot column contains too many distinct values, the resulting table may have too many columns. In all cases the process involved, finding distinct values when creating the table or doing the group by when using it, can be very long and sometimes can fail because of exhausted memory.
trans-unit.target: 这有时可能是有风险的。如果数据透视列包含太多不同的值,那么生成的表可能有太多的列。在所有情况下,在创建表时寻找不同的值,或者在使用表时进行分组,所涉及的过程可能非常长,有时可能因为内存耗尽而失败。

trans-unit.source: This means also that CONNECT is not designed to be used by centralized servers, which are mostly used for transactions and often must run a long time without human intervening.

trans-unit.source: This means that cross-database updates not work with replication filters and statement-based binary logging. For example, if replicate_do_table=db2.tab were set, then the following would not replicate with statement-based binary logging:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着跨数据库更新不适用于复制筛选器和基于语句的二进制日志记录。例如，如果设置了 replicate_do_table=db2.tab ，那么以下内容将不会与基于语句的二进制日志记录一起复制：

trans-unit.source: This means that cross-database updates work with replication filters and statement-based binary logging.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着跨数据库更新可以与复制过滤器和基于语句的二进制日志一起工作。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the column is not explicitly assigned a value in an INSERT or UPDATE query, then MariaDB will automatically initialize the column's value with the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果未在 INSERT 或 UPDATE 查询中为该列显式分配一个值，那么MariaDB将使用当前日期和时间自动初始化该列的值。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the table definition changes on S3 and it's in the local cache, one has to execute FLUSH TABLES to get MariaDB to notice the change and update the .frm file.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果表定义在S3上更改并且位于本地缓存中，则必须执行 FLUSH TABLES 来使MariaDB注意到更改并更新.frm文件。

trans-unit.source: This means that it is not possible to correctly retrieve a remote table if it contains columns having different character sets. A solution is to retrieve it by several local tables, each accessing only columns with the same character set.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着,如果远程表中包含具有不同字符集的列,则无法正确检索该表。解决办法是通过几个本地表来检索,每个表只访问具有相同字符集的列。

trans-unit.source: This means that statements such as CREATE, ALTER, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE will be logged, but statements that have no effect on the data, such as SELECT and SHOW, will not be logged. If you want to log these (at a cost in performance), use the general query log.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着将记录诸如CREATE，ALTER，INSERT，UPDATE和DELETE之类的语句，但不会记录对数据无影响的语句（如SELECT和SHOW）。如果您想记录这些（以性能为代价），请使用常规查询日志。

trans-unit.source: This means that the left join ac_dob on ... part can be removed from the query and this is what Table Elimination module does. The detection logic is rather smart, for example it would be able to remove the left join ac_rating on ... part as well, together with the subquery (in the above example it won't be removed because ac_rating used in the selection list of the query). The Table Elimination module can also handle nested outer joins and multi-table outer joins.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着可以从查询中删除 left join ac_dob on ... 部分上的左联接ac_dob，这就是表消除模块的作用。检测逻辑非常聪明，例如，它还能删除 left join ac_rating on ... 部分上的左联接ac_rating以及子查询（在上面的示例中，不会删除它，因为ac_rating用于以下选项的选择列表中）查询）。表消除模块还可以处理嵌套的外部联接和多表外部联接。

trans-unit.source: This means that the root@localhost user account will use mysql_native_password authentication by default. There are some other differences as well. See mysql_install_db: User Accounts Created by Default for more information.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着默认情况下， root@localhost 用户帐户将使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证。还有其他一些区别。有关更多信息，请参见mysql_install_db：默认创建的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: This means that the header of the memory-mapped file-based transaction coordinator log is corrupt. To recover from this error, delete the file defined by the --log-tc server option, and then restart the server with the --tc-heuristic-recover option set.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着基于内存映射的基于文件的事务协调器日志的标头已损坏。要从此错误中恢复，请删除 --log-tc 服务器选项定义的文件，然后使用 --tc-heuristic-recover 选项集重新启动服务器。

trans-unit.source: This means that the history for the first week after the table was created will be stored in p0. The history for the second week — in p1, and all later history will go into p2. One can see the exact rotation time for each partition in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PARTITIONS table.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着创建表后第一周的历史记录将存储在 p0 中。第二周的历史记录-在 p1 中，以后的所有历史记录都将记录在 p2 中。您可以在 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PARTITIONS 表中看到每个分区的确切旋转时间。

trans-unit.source: This means that the optimizer is planning to do index lookups into the materialized table. In other words, we're going to use the Materialization-lookup strategy.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着优化器正计划对物化表进行索引查找。换句话说,我们将使用 Materialization-lookup 策略。

trans-unit.source: This means that the table changed between two reads and the handler can't handle this case for the given scan.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着表在两次读取之间发生了变化,处理程序无法处理给定扫描的这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This means that we can reparse the procedure as many time as we want. The first time, the resulting Lex is used to store the procedure in the database (using the function sp.c:sp_create_procedure()).
trans-unit.target: 这意味着我们可以任意多次重复使用存储过程。第一次,产生的Lex用于将存储过程存储在数据库中(使用函数sp.c:sp_create_procedure())。

trans-unit.source: This means that when log_bin_trust_function_creators is OFF and log_bin is ON, CREATE FUNCTION and ALTER FUNCTION statements will only succeed if the function is defined with any of the DETERMINISTIC, NO SQL, or READS SQL DATA characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，当 log_bin_trust_function_creators 为 OFF 且 log_bin 为 ON 时，仅当使用 DETERMINISTIC ， NO SQL 或 READS SQL DATA 特征之一定义函数时， CREATE FUNCTION 和 ALTER FUNCTION 语句才会成功。

trans-unit.source: This means that with transaction isolation level at least REPEATABLE READ, the START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT statement can be used to ensure that queries will see a transaction-consistent view of the database also between storage engines. It is then not possible for a query to see the changes from some transaction T in XtraDB tables without also seeing the changes T makes to PBXT tables. (Within a single transactional storage engine like XtraDB or PBXT, consistency is always guaranteed even without using START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT).
trans-unit.target: 这意味着在事务隔离级别至少为REPEATABLE READ的情况下，可以使用 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 语句来确保查询也将在存储引擎之间看到数据库的事务一致视图。这样一来，查询就无法查看XtraDB表中某些事务T的更改，而又看不到T对PBXT表的更改。 （在单个事务存储引擎（如XtraDB或PBXT）中，即使不使用具有 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT ，也始终可以确保一致性）。

trans-unit.source: This means that, if an operation supports the INSTANT algorithm, then it will use that algorithm by default. If an operation does not support the INSTANT algorithm, but it does support the NOCOPY algorithm, then it will use that algorithm by default. If an operation does not support the NOCOPY algorithm, but it does support the INPLACE algorithm, then it will use that algorithm by default.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果操作支持 INSTANT 算法，则默认情况下它将使用该算法。如果某个操作不支持 INSTANT 算法，但支持 NOCOPY 算法，则默认情况下将使用该算法。如果某个操作不支持 NOCOPY 算法，但是支持 INPLACE 算法，则默认情况下将使用该算法。

trans-unit.source: This means that, if you know what client authentication plugin your user account requires, then you can avoid an unnecessary authentication restart and you can save two packets and two round-trips.between the client and server by configuring your client to use the correct authentication plugin by default.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着,如果你知道你的用户账户需要什么样的客户端认证插件,那么你可以避免不必要的认证重启,你可以通过配置你的客户端默认使用正确的认证插件来节省客户端和服务器之间的两个数据包和两次往返。

trans-unit.source: This means there were:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着有。

trans-unit.source: This means, subquery tables must be after all of the parent select's tables that are referred from the subquery predicate.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着,子查询表必须在所有从子查询谓词引用的父select的表之后。

trans-unit.target: 这条消息表明,表的定义允许表的InnoDB行格式实际不能存储的行。

trans-unit.source: This message is raised in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: 在下列情况下会发出此信息:

trans-unit.source: This method allows initializing the TABLE_SHARE using a conventional SQL CREATE TABLE syntax.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许使用常规的SQL CREATE TABLE 语法初始化 TABLE_SHARE 。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used as a quick way to make a “template” table definition that can later be edited to make the desired definition. In particular, column names are constructed from all the nodes of their path in order to have distinct column names. This can be manually edited to have the desired names, provided their XPATH is not modified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用作快速创建“模板”表定义的方法，以后可以对其进行编辑以创建所需的定义。特别是，列名是从其路径的所有节点构造的，以便具有不同的列名。如果未修改其XPATH，则可以对其进行手动编辑以具有所需的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used as a quick way to make a “template” table definition that can later be edited to make the desired definition. In particular, column names are constructed from all the object keys of their path in order to have distinct column names. This can be manually edited to have the desired names, provided their JPATH key names are not modified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用作快速创建“模板”表定义的方法，以后可以对其进行编辑以创建所需的定义。特别是，列名是根据其路径的所有对象键构造的，以便具有不同的列名。如果未修改其JPATH密钥名称，则可以对其进行手动编辑以具有所需的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method enables to make the zip file from another file when creating the table. It applies to all table types including XML and JSON. It is specified in the create table statement with the load option. For example:
trans-unit.target: 本方法可以在创建表格时,从另一个文件中制作zip文件,适用于所有表格类型,包括XML和JSON。它适用于所有表格类型,包括XML和JSON。它是在创建表语句中指定的加载选项。例如,在创建表的语句中指定加载选项。

trans-unit.source: This method is optional. For the engine that does not implement it, MariaDB will look for files with the tablefile_extensions[0], if possible. But if the engine is not file-based, MariaDB will use the discover_table() method to perform a full table discovery. While this will allow determining correctly whether a table exists, a full discovery is usually slower than the simple existence check. In other words, engines that are not file-based might want to support discover_table_existence() method as a useful optimization.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是可选的。对于没有实现它的引擎，MariaDB将在可能的情况下使用 tablefile_extensions[0] 查找文件。但是，如果引擎不是基于文件的，则MariaDB将使用 discover_table() 方法执行全表发现。虽然这将允许正确确定表是否存在，但是完整发现通常比简单的存在检查慢。换句话说，不是基于文件的引擎可能希望支持 discover_table_existence() 方法作为有用的优化。

trans-unit.source: This method is particularly useful when setting up a new slave from a backup of the master. Remember to ensure that the value of server_id configured on the new slave is different from that of any other server in the replication topology.
trans-unit.target: 从主机的备份设置新的从机时，此方法特别有用。请记住要确保在新从服务器上配置的 server_id 的值与复制拓扑中任何其他服务器的值都不相同。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by engines that use "frm shipping" — such as Archive or NDB Cluster in MySQL. An frm shipping engine reads the frm file for a given table, exactly as it was generated by the server, and stores it internally. Later it can discover the table structure by using this very frm image. In this sense, a separate frm file in the database directory becomes redundant, because a copy of it is stored in the engine.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ frm传送”的引擎（例如MySQL中的Archive或NDB Cluster ）使用此方法。frm传送引擎读取给定表的frm文件（与服务器生成的文件完全相同），并将其存储在内部。后来，它可以通过使用此非常frm图像来发现表结构。从这个意义上讲，数据库目录中单独的frm文件变得多余，因为它的副本存储在引擎中。

trans-unit.source: This method should return the following: fs.file-max = 6815744
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该返回以下内容:fs.file-max=6815744。

trans-unit.source: This minimizes the cost to a single brief lock for the access of an integer when operating normally. Only in the event of an actual drop or alter, is the cache cleared. This may seem to be drastic, but since we assume that this is a rare event, it's not a problem. It would of course be possible to have a much more fine-grained solution, keeping track of each SP, but the overhead of doing so is not worth the effort.
trans-unit.target: 这样在正常运行时,可以最大限度地降低对整数访问的单次短暂锁的成本。只有在实际发生丢弃或改变的情况下,才会清除缓存。这可能看起来很激烈,但由于我们假设这是一个罕见的事件,所以这不是一个问题。当然,我们可以有一个更精细的解决方案,跟踪每一个SP,但这样做的开销是不值得的。

trans-unit.target: 该范围内存储的最小值

trans-unit.source: This mode can be enabled by setting the binlog_format system variable to MIXED.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将 binlog_format 系统变量设置为 MIXED 来启用此模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode can be enabled by setting the binlog_format system variable to ROW.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将 binlog_format 系统变量设置为 ROW 来启用此模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode can be enabled by setting the binlog_format system variable to STATEMENT.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将 binlog_format 系统变量设置为 STATEMENT 来启用此模式。

FORCE with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. For example:
